overview: Shaaban works as a photographer in a newspaper, with whom the dangerous criminal Napoleon agrees to take a number of photos to compete with Ibrahim and his gang as they steal a company's treasury in exchange for money to succeed in his mission. Abraham bargains for half the amount he agrees, Napoleon succeeds in rushing him and torturing him to get the money back. Men of his fiancee and the company paid with the two gangs. Shaaban hands his share of the stolen money to the police.
title: Looking for Troubles
